  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sdt.sulinet.hu:0d1a4d92-3232-4586-8e3a-3a60bf90d1da</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>sdt.sulinet.hu</catalog>
            <entry>0d1a4d92-3232-4586-8e3a-3a60bf90d1da</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A Columbia űrrepülőgép katasztrófája</string>
            <string language="en-US">Catastrophe of the Columbia Spaceshuttle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Katastrophe der Kolumbiens Spaceshuttle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Catastrophe de la Colombie Spaceshuttle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Catastrophe da Colômbia Spaceshuttle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Catastrofe della Colombia Spaceshuttle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταστροφή της Κολούμπια Spaceshuttle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Catástrofe del Colombia Spaceshuttle</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A Columbia űrrepülőgép a felszállás közben megsérült, a visszatérés során felrobbant (2003-ban 7 űrhajós életét vesztette)</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Columbia Spaceshuttle damaged during take-off and exploded during the come-back (7 astronauts died in 2003)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">csillagászat</string>
            <string language="en-US">astronomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">Columbia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">űrrepülű</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">űrhajós</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">katasztrófa</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kolumbien Spaceshuttle beschädigte während 
des Starts und explodierte während des Comebacks (7 Astronauten 
gestorben 2003)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Colombie Spaceshuttle a endommagé pendant le 
décollage et a éclaté pendant le retour (7 astronautes morts en 
2003)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Colômbia Spaceshuttle danificou durante a 
decolagem e explodiu durante o come-back (7 astronautas morridos em 
2003)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Colombia Spaceshuttle ha danneggiato durante il
decollo ed ha esploso durante il ritorno (7 atronauti morti in 2003)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η Κολούμπια Spaceshuttle χαλασμένο κατά τη διάρκεια
της απογείωσης και που εκρήγνυται κατά τη διάρκεια της επιστροφής
(7 αστροναύτες πέθαναν το 2003)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Colombia Spaceshuttle dañó durante despegue y
estalló durante la vuelta (7 astronautas muertos en 2003)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αστρονομία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">astronomía</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en-US">It may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
